exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat -> Prop d : forall x : nat, dec (p x) H : exists y, p y n : nat H0 : p n The term "n" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "Prop".

In environment X : Prop -> Type p : nat -> Prop d : forall x : nat, dec (p x) H : exists y, p y n : nat H0 : p n x : nat p0 : p x Heqs : mu d H = exist p x p0 Unable to unify "0 <= ?M1812" with "x <= n".
In environment X0, X : Prop -> Type p : nat -> Prop d : forall x : nat, dec (p x) H : exists y, p y n : nat H0 : p n x : nat p0 : p x Heqs : mu d H = exist p x p0 Unable to unify "n" with "x".

original: intros n Hp H. unfold mu'. destruct (dec n) as [Hn|Hn]. - intro. apply Nat.le_0_l. - apply Nat.le_refl.
